    public class ForwardGameRole
extends java.lang.Object

    This is the forward class which serves to collect balls from dispense, travel to a pre-configured launch location and
    Author:

      • ForwardGameRole

        public ForwardGameRole(GameData gd,
               Navigation navigation,
               Odometer odometer,
               lejos.hardware.sensor.EV3UltrasonicSensor usSensor,
               Shooter shooter,
               double BOX_SIZE)
        Public constructor for Forward. Must be called with valid references.
        Parameters:
        gd - GameData object for map awareness.
        navigation - Navigation object to navigate across the field.
        odometer - Odometer object for odometry.
        shooter - Shooter object to control launch motors.

      • moveToLocation

        private void moveToLocation(int pos)
        Moves the robot into position using a Navigation object. The launch location is roughly 8.3 feet away target.
        Parameters:
        pos - Integer representing the location of launch.

        private void shoot()
        Rotate toward the target and launches the ball at the target.
